oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Happy To Be With You - Johnny Cash performance
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance of Happy To Be With You, written by Johnny Cash, June Carter, and Merle Kilgore, published by Copper Creek Music Inc., EMI Al Gallico Music Corp., House Of Cash Southwind Music, and Unichappell Music Inc., produced by Don Law and Frank Jones, recorded on July 28, 1965 at Columbia Recording Studio in Nashville, TN, released by Columbia on October 11, 1965, and performed by Johnny Cash (vocal and guitar), Marshall Grant (bass), W.S. Holland (drums), Luther Perkins (guitar), Statler Brothers (background vocals), and Bill Pursell (organ).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Johnny Cash
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Johnny Cash performs "Happy To Be With You"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Cash, Johnny, 1932-2003; Carter, June; Kilgore, Merle; Law, Donald F., 1902-1982; Jones, Frank, 1928-2005; Columbia Records, Inc; Grant, Marshall (Bassist); Pursell, Bill; Perkins, Luther; Statesmen Quartet; Holland, W. S.
